text: Voistinu, Allakhu ne zazorno privodit' v kachestve primera i pritchi komara i dazhe to, chto men'she yego. I te, kotoryye uverovali, ponimayut, chto eta pritcha - istina, nisposlannaya ikh Gospodom. Te zhe, kotoryye ne uverovali, skazhut: "Chego khotel Allakh, privodya etu pritchu?" [A togo, chto] yeyu On odnikh vvodit v zabluzhdeniye, a drugikh vedet pryamym putem. No On vvergayet v zabluzhdeniye tol'ko nechestivtsev
